name: City Limits (SpaceMyFriend)
description:
Relax and build cities on a desolate tranquil island. Plan ahead to cover the island efficiently by combining buildings and cementing your place on a tile. Each turn an entity spreads, attempting to take over barren or unstable tiles.

Controls

  • Mouse Left Click - Place Tiles
  • Mouse Wheel - Change Tiles

Credits

Sound effects where used from various free sound libraries.

Abaddon Font by  by Nathan Scott (@caffi_nate)

Made for the PPJJGG jam
